15 to the power of negative 2 end exponent space x space 15 to the power of negative 3 end exponent
equals space 1 over 15 squared space x space 1 over 15 cubed
equals space fraction numerator 1 space x space 1 over denominator 15 squared space x space 15 cubed end fraction
equals space 1 over 15 to the power of 2 plus 3 end exponent
equals space 1 over 15 to the power of 5
